alert.note: Alert for Hill; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 05 at 1:41PM CDT until May 05 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Falls, Hill, Limestone and McLennan counties. * WHEN...Until 445 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas as well as flooded low-water crossings and ponding water on roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Waco, Hewitt, Robinson, Bellmead, Woodway, Mexia, Lacy- Lakeview, Marlin, McGregor, Groesbeck, Mart, Beverly Hills, Lorena, Bruceville-Eddy, Hubbard, Moody, Riesel, Coolidge, Golinda and Hallsburg.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
